DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the usefulness of contrast in ultrasonography of the joints.
DOC.brief_title: Pre and Post Arthrogram Ultrasound Images of Joints
DOC.detailed_description: To determine if using intra-articular contrast (contrast injected into a joint) will provide clearer, more precise ultrasound images of the joints then an ultrasound done without the use of a contrast agent.
DOC.criteria: clinically ordered arthrogram pregnant women children under the age of 18
